# Beckhoff.TwinCAT.HMI.EcDiagnosticsControl

This package provides diagnostic utilities for EtherCAT in TwinCAT HMI applications.

## Usage

Add `Beckhoff.TwinCAT.HMI.EcDiagnosticsControl` to your TwinCAT HMI project to enable advanced EtherCAT diagnostic features and tools.

## Documentation

For detailed usage and configuration, refer to the [Beckhoff TwinCAT HMI documentation](https://infosys.beckhoff.de/content/1033/te2000_tc3_hmi_engineering/index.html).
